text: Ata'eba tara prabhu take kabula karalena sundara sbikrtira sathe, phale take bardhita karalena sundara bardhane, ara take samarpana karalena yakariyara abhibhakatbe. Yakhana yakariya take dekhate upasanasthale prabesa karatena tini tara kache dekhate petena riyeka. Tini balalena -- ''he mariyama! E tomara kache kotha theke?’’ Se balale -- ''e allah‌ra darabara theke.’’ Nihsandeha allah yake icche karena take behisaba riyeka dana karena.
